ABOUT ME

Hey there! My name is Iqra (pronounced ick-ra) I am a Dallas, TX based web developer who is passionate about crafting beautiful and lasting impressions on the web. I enjoy working with front end technologies such as React and Redux and I'm also experienced with back end technologies such as Node, Express and MongoDB. Please checkout some of my recent projects below.
I am always open to chatting about ideas and collaborating. So if you like what you see, don't hesitate to get in touch!
